title: New: The Weeknd – Thursday
body:
So yeah, a new **Weeknd** Mixtape dropped.

Fuck writing, I’m listening.

Expect a review in the coming days. For those outside of Canada/USA who waited up, i salute you.

**_Thursday_ track list:**

01\. Lonely Star  
02\. Life Of The Party  
03\. Thursday  
04\. The Zone  
05\. The Birds (Part One)  
06\. The Birds (Part Two)  
07\. Gone  
08\. Rolling Stone  
09\. Heaven or Las Vegas

Download the album **[HERE.](http://www.mediafire.com/?0peohl9l2xn3ld4)**

excerpt.full: So yeah, a new Weeknd Mixtape dropped. Fuck writing, I’m listening. Expect a review in the coming days. For those outside of Canada/USA who waited up, i salute you. Thursday track list: 01. Lonely Star 02. Life Of The Party 03. Thursday 04. The Zone 05. The Birds (Part One) 06. The Birds (Part Two) \[…\]
